LanguageData.AM_ScrapRitualOutcome.description: Залежно від якості ритуалу, учасники отримають від {MINMOOD} до {MAXMOOD} настрій на {MOODDAYS} днів.
LanguageData.AM_ScrapRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.0.d: The {0} was terrible. We've learned almost nothing and all the tech was wasted.
LanguageData.AM_ScrapRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.1.d: The {0} was mediocre. There was a great deal of waste in the deconstruction process and little was learned.
LanguageData.AM_ScrapRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.2.d: We succesfully extracted both materials and a great deal of knowledge from {0}.
LanguageData.AM_ScrapRitualOutcome.outcomeChances.3.d: The {0} was spectacular. It has progressed our knowledge forward, and a great deal of useable salvage was recovered.
LanguageData.AM_ScrapRitualOutcome.comps.0.label: кількість учасників
LanguageData.AM_ScrapRitualOutcome.comps.1.label: Scapper
